'''Biome Settlers Skin Pack 2'''<ref>{{Cite|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160527042547/https://mojang.com/2016/05/biome-settlers-pack-2-now-available-for-download/|title=Biome Settlers Pack 2 now available for download|author=Marsh Davies|date=May 19, 2016|website=Mojang.com}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] themed around the inhabitants of [[Mushroom Fields]] and [[Nether Wastes]].
